ShipGenelineDef.label: Astral Cniderian
ShipGenelineDef.description: A geneline heavily inspired by cniderians, a pyhulm encompasing jellyfish, corals, hydras, and sea anemones.

BuildingGeneDef.label: small nematocyst
BuildingGeneDef.description: An explosive cell capable of launching a barbed thread. Devastating in their own right, they can act as delivery mechanisms for all manner of acid and toxin.

BuildingGeneDef.label: medium acid
BuildingGeneDef.description: Specialized glands launch globules of acidic mucus.

BuildingGeneDef.label: spine launcher
BuildingGeneDef.description: Specialized barbs driven by biosplasma, capable of hunting tracking prey.

BuildingGeneDef.label: jelly cannon
BuildingGeneDef.description: Launches a void jelly, a destructive organism capable of tearing hulls apart.

BuildingGeneDef.label: coral armor
BuildingGeneDef.description: Layers of ablative coral that provides exceptional protection against acid, toxin, and blunt impact.
